meanings.definition: To pass urine from the body.
meanings.sent1: I need to urinate before we leave for the trip.
meanings.sent2: Dogs usually urinate outside to mark their territory.
meanings.sent3: The cat decided to urinate in the flower pot instead of the litter box.
meanings.sent4: The overflowing river seemed to urinate into the vast ocean.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the waterfall was like nature's way of urinating.

meanings.sent1: After drinking a lot of water, I had to urinate frequently.
meanings.sent2: It is important to urinate regularly to maintain good kidney health.
meanings.sent3: The leaky faucet seemed to urinate drops of water all night long.
meanings.sent4: The burst pipe caused the water to urinate uncontrollably into the basement.
meanings.sent5: The rain clouds seemed to urinate non-stop for hours on end.
